page.title: 09THE VICAR OF BATTYEFORD-CONT
page.content: He does not have services every day but prays on his own in the church.He does not think beliefs will change but the way in which people understand them will.He believes that churches will exist in the future and someone like a Vicar will lead the church. The Vicar does not think that church_going should be compulsory.He thinks church activities such as Guides and Scouts are good things for children to be involved.{He is {chaplain, for Mirfield and {Heckmondwike Scouts,Chairman of {Battyeford Summer Playscheme and also {Chairman of the Govenors at Battyeford {Middle School.
